name: Bomb Buddies (Dark_Knife15)
description: Important: I would only recommend playing the browser version if you don't mind about the graphics and audio, I didn't have to time figure out the problem with it, but the WebGL build must have compressed the audio files quite a bit. It also forces me to use Unity's gamma colour space, compared to the linear colour space. Credits: Music: Abstraction ben_burnes https://soundcloud.com/abstraction Controls: Movement: WASD Shoot: Left Mouse Button Switch Player: Left Shift Reload: R Open Chest/Use Powerup: E
